subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: William Gallas headed in a corner from Cesc Fabregas during injury time in the first half and Arsenal beat Chelsea for the first time in three years, 1-0. The victory kept Arsenal atop the Premier League standings with 40 points, ahead of United with 39 and Chelsea with 34.
